channel.title: Question on Media Sharing. [XBox 360]
channel.description:
OK.
I used to use WMP [Windows Media Player] to share my PC media, with my 360. Since I moved, I got a new ISP and new router. It worked for a few days, and then WHAM. it wasn't working for the 360. But WMP still had it shared?
But old story... [I'd still like help in that subject].
Now I got Nero 8.
How do I share my 360 with Nero? I was in Media Home, I clicked start server, and still, nothing? [Hope I did that right.]
Any help?
Thanks, Divine.

item.title: Question on Media Sharing. [XBox 360]
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

OK.

I used to use WMP [Windows Media Player] to share my PC media, with my 360.
Since I moved, I got a new ISP and new router. It worked for a few days, and then WHAM. it wasn’t working for the 360. But WMP still had it shared?

But old story… [I’d still like help in that subject].

Now I got Nero 8.

How do I share my 360 with Nero?
I was in Media Home, I clicked start server, and still, nothing? [Hope I did that right.]

Any help?

Thanks, Divine.
